title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point for stating that the shape of the population pyramid indicates a high dependency ratio.

Two points for describing how the population pyramid indicates a high dependency ratio.
descriptions: The response does not correctly describe the dependency ratio indicated by the shape of the population pyramid shown using one of the following :
The response correctly describes the dependency ratio indicated by the shape of the population pyramid shown using one of the following:

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point for stating an economic factor that may contribute to the local population trend shown in the graph.

Two points for explaining how the trend shown on the graph relates to an economic factor that may contribute to population growth.

The response correctly explains one of the following economic factors that may contribute to the local population trend shown in the graph:

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point for stating an environmental push factor.

Two points for explaining how an environmental push factor may affect the population structure shown in the graph.
descriptions: The response does not correctly explain one of the following degrees to which environmental push factors may affect the population structure for the community shown in the graph:
The response correctly explains one of the following degrees to which environmental push factors may affect the population structure for the community shown in the graph:

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point for stating that demand for housing will increase.

Two points for explaining how the population pyramid indicates that there will be an increased demand for housing.
descriptions: The response does not correctly explain one of the following possible outcomes regarding future housing demand based on the population pyramid shown:
The response correctly explains one of the following possible outcomes regarding future housing demand based on the population pyramid shown:
